document.discussion_title: Can you help us to find Samantha?
document.topic_text: Can you help us to find Samantha? May 10, 2016 Send by email Nottinghamshire Police is appealing for information to locate a woman who has been reported missing from home. Samantha Clarke, 35, was last seen at around 9.30am on Monday 9 May in Church Street, in Mansfield. She has not been seen or heard from since then by relatives, who are growing increasingly concerned for her. Samantha is white, of slim build and around 5ft 2ins tall. She has long, dark brown hair. She was wearing a cream cardigan, white top and patterned trousers or leggings when she was last seen. She may be travelling in a silver Peugeot 107. Anyone who may have seen Samantha or knows of her whereabouts is asked to telephone Nottinghamshire Police on 101, quoting incident number 909 of 9 May. Neighbourhood:
